https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9uFDSZZbR6FwVrttlyJo2rXtusO.jpg Five years after her son was killed, Tess Ford is ready to live again. But a one-night romance with a handsome soldier throws her life back into chaos as the young man's attraction turns out to be a frightening obsession. A Lover Betrayed
